mustVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ You must be in a voice channel!
noVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ Im not on any voice channel!
sameVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ You must be in the same channel!
onVC: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ I'm already on your voice channel!
errorJOIN: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ An error occurred while trying to join the voice channel. Try using the **play** command!
suksesLOOP: <:Y_:848429615323021354> ・ **Looping** a song. Turn off using **loop off** command!
errorLYRIC1: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ Please enter the title of the song!
errorLYRIC3: <:N_:848429469688397854> ・ An error occurred while searching for song lyrics.
